data.title: Crainquebille (L'Affaire Crainquebille) (The Heritage Press) by France, Anatole; LeClercq, Jacques: Very Good Hard Cover (1949) Reissue.
data.meta_description: Reissue. - Hard Cover - The Heritage Press - 1949 - Condition: Very Good - Very Good - Includes publisher's slipcase and Sandglass insert Number XII:15. Spine toned, top slipcase corner bumped, small spot on slipcase edge. 1949 Hard Cover. xiii, [3], 69 pp. A short story by the French poet, journalist, and novelist. The son of a Paris bookseller, he won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1921. Translated from the original French, with an introduction, by Jacques LeClercq. Illustrations by Bernard Lamotte. - Crainquebille (L'Affaire Crainquebille) (The Heritage Press)

Shipping Terms:

PLEASE NOTE -- We highly recommend expedited shipping for all time-sensitive orders. All orders receive tracking, the details of which we provide by e-mail. We ship books six days a week, and most orders ship the day after we receive them (some the same day).
